body:
The court will decide whether to appoint a deputy to make ongoing property and financial affairs decisions on behalf of the person the application is about.

**What you need to do**

Use this form to tell the Court of Protection whether you agree or disagree with a property and financial affairs application.

It usually takes about 5 minutes.

You have 14 days from the day you were told about the application to complete this form.

Read about how deputies [make decisions for someone who lacks capacity](https://www.gov.uk/become-deputy).

If you need legal advice please contact a solicitor or your local Citizens Advice.

**Content to do**

* Reassurance if you object
heading: Respond to a property and financial affairs application
